001package squidpony.examples;
002
003import squidpony.squidgrid.gui.SColor;
004
005/**
006 * This class holds the items needed for constructing and using a test map for various grid algorithms.
007 *
008 * @author @author Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
009 */
010public class TestMap {
011

053        "#...................#..............#.....#E.+.#.....#...........#..c..#...#AAAAAAA....AAAAu..uAAAAAø",
054        "#...................#..............#.....####.#.....#...........###..E#...#AAAAAA...AAAAAuuu.uAAAAAø",
055        "#..................................#.....#E.+.#.....#...........#E+.EE#...#AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAuuAAAAAø",
056        "###########################################################################AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAø"
057    };
058
059    private int width = DEFAULT_MAP[0].length(), height = DEFAULT_MAP.length;
060    private DemoCell[][] map;
061    private double[][] resistances;
062
063    public TestMap() {
064        map = new DemoCell[width][height];
065        resistances = new double[width][height];
066        for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {
067            for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
068                char c = DEFAULT_MAP[y].charAt(x);
069                map[x][y] = buildCell(c);
070                resistances[x][y] = map[x][y].resistance;
071            }
072        }
073    }
074    
075    public double[][] resistances(){
076        return resistances;
077    }
078    
079    public char symbol(int x, int y){
080        return map[x][y].representation;
081    }
082    
083    public SColor color(int x, int y){
084        return map[x][y].color;
085    }
086    
087    public int width(){
088        return width;
089    }
090    
091    public int height(){
092        return height;
093    }
094
095    /**
096     * Builds a cell based on the character in the map.
097     *
098     * @param c
099     * @return
100     */
101    private DemoCell buildCell(char c) {
102        float resistance = 0f;//default is transparent
103        SColor color;
104        switch (c) {
105            case '.'://stone ground
106                color = SColor.SLATE_GRAY;
107                break;
108            case '¸'://grass
109                color = SColor.GREEN;
110                break;
111            case ','://pathway
112                color = SColor.STOREROOM_BROWN;
113                c = '.';
114                break;
115            case 'c':
116                color = SColor.SEPIA;
117                break;
118            case '/':
119                color = SColor.BROWNER;
120                break;
121            case '≈':
122                color = SColor.AZUL;
123                break;
124            case '<':
125            case '>':
126                color = SColor.SLATE_GRAY;
127                break;
128            case 't':
129                color = SColor.BROWNER;
130                resistance = 0.3f;
131                break;
132            case 'm':
133                color = SColor.BAIKO_BROWN;
134                resistance = 0.1f;
135                break;
136            case 'u':
137                color = SColor.TAN;
138                resistance = 0.2f;
139                break;
140            case 'T':
141            case '₤':
142                color = SColor.FOREST_GREEN;
143                resistance = 0.7f;
144                break;
145            case 'E':
146                color = SColor.SILVER;
147                resistance = 0.8f;
148                break;
149            case 'S':
150                color = SColor.BREWED_MUSTARD_BROWN;
151                resistance = 0.9f;
152                break;
153            case '#':
154                color = SColor.SLATE_GRAY;
155                resistance = 1f;
156                break;
157            case '+':
158                color = SColor.BROWNER;
159                resistance = 1f;
160                break;
161            case 'A':
162                color = SColor.ALICE_BLUE;
163                resistance = 1f;
164                break;
165            case 'ø':
166                c = ' ';
167                color = SColor.BLACK;
168                resistance = 1f;
169                break;
170            default://opaque items
171                resistance = 1f;//unknown is opaque
172                color = SColor.DEEP_PINK;
173        }
174        return new DemoCell(resistance, c, color);
175    }
176
177    private class DemoCell {
178
179        float resistance;
180        char representation;
181        SColor color;
182
183        /**
184         * Creates a new cell which has minimal properties needed to represent it.
185         *
186         * @param resistance
187         * @param light
188         * @param representation
189         */
190        public DemoCell(float resistance, char representation, SColor color) {
191            this.resistance = resistance;
192            this.representation = representation;
193            this.color = color;
194        }
195    }
196}
